example.title: Data Processing
example.program:
# this program uses float() to convert the string literal input
num = input("Enter a number: ") # num will contain a string literal num = float(num) # data becomes a floating-point type
square = num * num # floating-point can be multipied print("The square of the number is", square)
example.description: Find square of a floating point number
